titleInfo.title: Little Jimmy Dickens at Park Pavilion (18027)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on brown) announcing Little Jimmy Dickens with Ernie Miller and the Country Boys at Park Pavilion on September 18. Poster features a metal photoplate of Little Jimmy Dickens. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/49046/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
